title: Spike Growth
content:
Spike Growth Level 2 Transmutation Spell 2~8 Damage 2d4Piercing Shape a piece of ground into hard spikes. Movement is halved. A creature walking on the spikes takes 2-8 Piercing damage for every 1.5m it moves. 100 turns 6m 18m Concentration Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Transmutation Spell

Shape a piece of ground into hard spikes. Movement is halved. A creature walking on the spikes takes 2-8 Piercing damage for every 1.5m it moves.

6m 18m Concentration

Spike Growth is a Spell in Baldur'
